icon.title: One focus, many uses
icon.description: A single-minded dedication can unlock a world of possibilities. By honing in on one core skill or idea, you create a foundation for diverse applications. This focused approach allows for deep expertise while simultaneously enabling adaptability across various domains.

cards.subtitle: Tons of plastic saved
cards.content: We saved 480,000 tons of plastic by moving to a new manufacturing machine. Thatâ€™s the weight of 24 elephants.

cards.subtitle: Liters of water saved
cards.content: 193,000 liters of water saved by using a sustainable dye for our products.

cards.subtitle: Manufacturing waste recycled
cards.content: 80% of our manufacturing waste is recycled.

cards.title: 10+ devs
cards.subtitle: Working on this project
cards.content: We have a team of 10+ developers working on this project. They are dedicated to making the world a better place.

cards.subtitle: Renewable energy
cards.content: We use 100% renewable energy to power our factories. This helps reduce our carbon footprint.

cards.subtitle: Trees planted
cards.content: We have planted 1,000,000 trees to help offset our carbon emissions. This is part of our commitment to sustainability.

cards.subtitle: Recyclable packaging
cards.content: All of our packaging is 100% recyclable. This helps reduce waste and protect the environment.

cards.title: Switzerland
cards.content: Switzerland is known for its beautiful landscapes and high quality of life. It is also home to SHL Medical, where we design and manufacture our products.

cards.title: Taiwan
cards.content: Taiwan is a hub for technology and innovation. It is also home to one of our manufacturing facilities, where we produce our products.

cards.title: Sweden
cards.content: Sweden is known for its commitment to sustainability and environmental protection. It is also home to one of our research and development centers.

knowledge.title: Discover the latest news, events and insights

cards.title: SHL Medical expert to speak at Novartis Campus in Basel
cards.content: SHL Medical will be in Basel for the Drug-Device Combination Products for Parenteral Use workshop.

cards.title: Strengthening a global manufacturing network through advanced simulation technologies
cards.content: In the Pre-filled Syringes and Injection Devices Issue of ONdrug Delivery Magazine, published ahead of the 2023 PDA Universe.

cards.title: SHL to attend 2022 NSTC Science Train Program
cards.content: SHL Medical is excited to announce our first-time participation in the NSTC Science Train Program, 2022.

contact.title: We value diversity and strive for excellence
contact.description: At our workplace, we value our international environment. We're not deterred by setbacks, but instead, we carry on with determination. We diligently research because we believe in the power of knowledge. Above all, our priority is always people.
